Class AbstractCRSType

Namespace
NDSH.Geospatial.Gml.ReferenceSystems
Assembly
NDSH.Geospatial.Metadata.ISO19115.Ed2003.dll

The AbstractCRSType specifies a coordinate reference system which is usually single but may be compound. This abstract complex type shall not be used, extended, or restricted, in a GML Application Schema, to define a concrete subtype with a meaning equivalent to a concrete subtype specified in this document.

[IsoType("AbstractCRSType", WrapperName = "CRSPropertyType", IsAbstract = true, IsoType = IsoTypes.ComplexType)]
[JsonObject("AbstractCRSType")]
public abstract class AbstractCRSType : IdentifiedObjectType, IModel, IObservableModel, INotifyPropertyChanged, IDbId, IStandardObjectProperties, IId, ITypeAssociated
